website_summaries.verdict: A modern and conveniently designed razor for do-it-yourself back shaves. Cost effective, as can accept most commercial razors in its design.
pros: Quality build that is comfortable to use
Stands out for its quality 4.5-inch wide Japanese stainless steel blade that gives a smooth and close shave
Can accept most commercial razors in its head if you run out of Razorba razors

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to shave your own back with the razor of your choice.
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive but well-designed razor holder makes it possible for me to shave my back with any razor of my choice, including the fast, effective wide double bladed razor provided. But I also like the idea that nearly any razor easily slips into the flexible rubber sleeve. My wife has already borrowed this for leg shaving that can now be done with less reaching. This looked like a good idea when I was considering alternatives and that's been proven in practice. I was concerned about the length, but it's plenty long and the razor can readily be positioned at different angles giving me plenty of reach to any part of my back. Well done, whoever designed this thing.
customer_reviews.author: tekritr

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried other types: this works best.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Razorbra, I bought my first one about 9 years ago. I’ve tried one more design but it wasn’t as good as the Razorbra. Pluses: the curve built into the handle is perfect for reaching your back. I have a glass stand- up shower. I tried another back shaver and the hard chrome design worried me about hitting the glass and breaking it. The softer plastic Razorbra doesn’t have that problem.

Beyond that, it took a bit of time to understand the coordination involved, but it turned out well. The razor did not spin around or give me fits - the head did hold it very well. Off I went - still use it on my back to this day.

product_meta.title: Razorba Back Hair Shaver
product_meta.description:
Size:Small| Color:Baby BlueLet’s face it, back hair isn’t attractive. The Razorba is the convenient, do it yourself, painless and embarrassment free solution to back hair removal. The Razorba is the patented razor handle wand that holds your favorite razor, ergonomically designed and tested by men with back hair. It solves the problem of back hair by letting you shave at your convenience. It works with any standard razors (not included). It's quick and easy to insert or remove a razor. To use, simply insert a razor into the Razorba, apply shaving cream and shave. With the Razorba you get: fast and convenient back hair shaving, it's do it yourself, painless, and no embarrassment. The Razorba really works. This award winning revolutionary product invented the back hair shaver. It has been featured in: Maxim Magazine, USA Today, Stuff Magazine, MTV, G4TechTV, The Rachael Ray Show and many other newspapers, magazines and television shows around the world. Blades dull, foils will fail, always choose a shaver with replaceable blades and foil. Otherwise, you will be stuck with an expensive disposable battery operated shaver. Using the Razorba, you are always guaranteed a great shave, because the razor can be replaced anytime you like. And you choose the blade. Use the very best Gillette or an inexpensive disposable. The Razorba is compatible with the Gillette Mach3, Gillette Sensor Excel, Bic, and most disposables. And you don’t need batteries! Gillette alone has spent over a billion dollars in research and development on it’s razors to provide the most comfortable and close shave possible. The Razorba supports this brand and others to provide our customers with the best shave possible. Because back hair is typically soft like the hair on your arms, and not stiff as the hair on your face, the results are impressive.
